member.name: T:Fidelity.Platform.Types.TypeLayout
member.summary: Type layout descriptor - size and alignment in bytes

member.name: T:Fidelity.Platform.Types
member.summary: Platform binding types for quotation-based platform descriptors. These types appear inside quotations and are inspected at compile time.

member.name: P:Fidelity.Platform.Linux_x86_64.Platform.platform
member.summary: Complete platform descriptor for Linux x86-64

member.name: P:Fidelity.Platform.Linux_x86_64.Platform.syscallConvention
member.summary: Linux x86-64 syscall convention (System V AMD64 ABI) Arguments: RDI, RSI, RDX, R10, R8, R9 Return: RAX (also RDX for 128-bit returns) Syscall number: RAX Clobbered: RCX, R11

member.name: P:Fidelity.Platform.Linux_x86_64.Platform.typeLayouts
member.summary: Type layouts for Linux x86-64 (LP64 data model) - int is 32-bit - long is 64-bit - pointer is 64-bit

member.name: P:Fidelity.Platform.Linux_x86_64.Syscalls.syscallTable
member.summary: Syscall table as quotation for compile-time inspection
